meanings.definition: Not cyclic or occurring in cycles.
meanings.sent1: The noncyclic pattern of the stars in the sky was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the noncyclic behavior of the weather patterns.
meanings.sent3: The noncyclic dance moves of the robot made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her noncyclic thoughts flowed freely, like a river without bends.
meanings.sent5: The noncyclic melody of the song lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: Not forming a closed loop or circuit.
meanings.sent1: The noncyclic road led straight through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The open field had a noncyclic fence surrounding it.
meanings.sent3: The noncyclic wire puzzled the electrician.
meanings.sent4: His noncyclic route took him through uncharted territory.
meanings.sent5: The noncyclic path through the maze was challenging to follow.
